content.rendered:
Directed by Vasanthabalan

Written by S. Ramakrishnan. Bakkiyam Shankar. Pon Parthiban

Star Abarnathy (Rosamalar). Premgi Amaren. Aparnathi (Rosamalar). Yogi Babu. Ghanshyam Garg. Jennifer (Mariapushpam). G.V. Prakash Kumar (Karuna). Ravi Mariya (Perumal). Neil Nitin Mukesh. Sudhanshu Pandey. Pakoda Pandi. Pasanga Pandi (Kalai). Chetan Pandit. Prabhakar. Inigo Prabhakaran. Nandhan Ram (Rocky). Saranya Ravichandran. Ronit Roy. Radhika Sarathkumar (Paapamma). Robo Shankar. Bobby Simha

Language Tamil

Production Krikes Cine Creations
